description: Delete a debug information file for a given project.

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the file belongs to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the slug of the project to delete the DIF.
path_parameters.name: project_slug

query_parameters.description: The id of the DIF to delete.
query_parameters.name: id

title: Delete a specific Project's Debug Information File
